headline: Las Vegas Sands Board of Directors Appoints Patrick Dumont as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE: LVS) announced today that Patrick Dumont will become the company's chairman and chief executive officer effective March 1, 2026. Mr. Dumont will succeed Robert G. Goldstein, who becomes a senior advisor to the company through March 2028.
